title: Scorched Earth
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B073DC4THCThe Keys are an ideal Vacation Destination until Frank and 50 of his closest friends got stuck there during a Zombie Apocalypse. They think the drive to get there was long and boring, wait until they try to get out! At the end of there journey lies a meetup with Steve and his gang. They're at the tail end of working on getting out of Florida when they all come together to keep the adventures going. Join Steve and Frank and the rest of the crew as they fight there way towards the cabin in Tennessee they are hoping will be there sanctuary.   If you are new to the Zournal please consider checking out Zournal 1 and Zournal 2 before reading this one, I promise it will help make it all make sense!
author: R.S. Merritt
